"For <S%G1063><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> those who are born <S%G1084><s%> of women <S%G1135><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3762><s%> a greater <S%G3187><s%> prophet <S%G4396><s%> than <S%G3187><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptizer, <S%G910><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> he who is least <S%G3398><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> greater than <S%G3187><s%> he. <S%G846><s%>"
